name: Bubble Fishing
description:
Who's the ruler of the sea? You!

With your trusty bubble partner, manipulate its movements and catch all the fishes in the sea to become the king of the ocean!

Credits:

Programs used:
* Unity
* MSPaint
* Photoshop
* Audacity

Design and Programming:
Both are done by me, with Unity Answers to help me along the way (I'm not exactly an expert at programming). 

Background music: 
Deliberate Thought by Kevin MacLeod
Deliberate Thought Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Sound Effects:
Most sounds are obtained from freesound.org, a few sound effects are done by me. 

Art: 
Art assets are drawn by me. Golden bubble was done by my good friend Tyler.
